select p.*, ca.id as ca_id, ca.name as ca_name, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name from posts p left join post_categories pc on p.id = pc.post_id and pc.deleted_at is null left join categories ca on pc.category_id = ca.id and ca.deleted_at is null left join post_tags pt on pc.post_id = pt.post_id and pt.deleted_at is null left join tags t on pt.tag_id = t.id and t.deleted_at is null where p.deleted_at is null and p.id = #{id}
